actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to provide that Columbia and Greene Counties, N. Y., shall be included in the northern judicial district of New York.

summary.text: Provides that Columbia and Greene Counties, New York, shall be included in the northern judicial district of New York. (Amends 28 U.S.C. 112)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to provide that Columbia and Greene Counties, N. Y., shall be included in the northern judicial district of New York.
